text: Viktor Oleksandrovych Zvyahintsev (, ; 22 October 1950 â€“ 22 April 2022) was a Ukrainian footballer. He was born in Stalino, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union. He played as a defender. He mainly played for FC Shakhtar Donetsk. His career lasted from 1968 until 1981. Zvyahintsev played for the Soviet Union national football team thirteen times from 1975 until 1976. He won a bronze medal at the 1976 Summer Olympics. Zvyahintsev died on 22 April 2022, aged 71. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union
title: Viktor Zvyahintsev
